item.title: Herd Hierarchy Week 16: Rams Still No. 1?; Patriots 'Aren't a Super Bowl Team'
item.description: The Rams continue to dominate. The Patriots falter. And the Packers fell on this week's edition of "Herd Hierarchy."

item.title: Notre Dame RB, Heisman Finalist Jeremiyah Love Declares for 2026 NFL Draft
item.description: The dynamic Fighting Irish standout will forego his senior season and move on to the pros following a Heisman-caliber 2025 campaign.
